author: Phil
content:
With the body of a younger woman

author: Rick Spilman
content: French Adventurer Drifting Across the Atlantic in a Barrel

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
As befits someone who is going for an ‘oldest person’ record she is sailing steady and spending time hove to when the weather ahead is inclement.
The longer it takes the older she’ll be ðŸ™‚
Go Girl. I’ve been following her excellent blog daily.

author: Willie
content:
Your welcome Rick, thanks for posting.

In this high speed, data-bite world in which we live, I find it refreshing to see and note people attempting and accomplishing tasks that require a great deal of patience and perseverance, especially those tasks exposed to the elements of nature in which there is no control over. Another person who has set out to accomplish such a task is Jean-Jacques Savin, a 71 yer old Frenchman who is attempting to cross the Atlantic in an enclosed barrel using the currents as his only means of propellant . Here is a link
https://youtu.be/XvqfKGIyl0E . Best Regards, Willie
